page.title: 14Spring Farm-Trowell
page.content: Spring Farm is a fixed farm located at GR 504 407.The farm covers 250 acres. On the farm there are 28 calves,10 beef cattle and 1 dairy cow.The farm machinery includes tractors,combine harvester,sugar beet harvester,potato harvester,bale transporter,corn drill,furrow plough and press,harrows and rollers,muck spreader and ditching machinery.The machinery is stored in sheds and the grain store.The farmer rotates the crop.The best quality land is under a three year rotation of winter wheat,sugar beet and potatoes. The sugar beet goes to a factory in Newark ,the corn goes to Liverpool and Melton Mowbray.The poor quality land is under a four year rotation of oil seed rape, two crops of winter wheat and either a crop of oats or barley.
